title: Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 20
description:
Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 20:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Ahmed - Rentier Capitalism; Disorganised Development and Social Injustice in Pakistan (2016)

-  Amin & Mage - Spectres of Capitalism; a Critique of Current Intellectual Fashions (1998)

-  Bond & Garcia (Eds.) - BRICS; an Anti-Capitalist Critique (2015)

-  Brockelman - Zizek and Heidegger; the Question Concerning Techno-Capitalism (2008)

-  Buchwalter (Ed.) - Hegel and Capitalism (2015)

-  Cederstrom & Fleming - Dead Man Working (2012)

-  Clements - Corporations Are Not People; Reclaiming Democracy from Big Money and Global Corporations (2014)

-  Davis - The Vanishing American Corporation; Navigating the Hazards of a New Economy (2016)

-  Denton - The Profiteers; Bechtel and the Men Who Built the World (2016)

-  Donoghue & Jennings - Building the Atlantic Empires; Unfree Labor and Imperial States in the Political Economy of Capitalism, ca. 1500-1914 (2016)

-  Emblemsvag - Reengineering Capitalism; From Industrial Revolution towards Sustainable Development (2016)

-  Franzini et al - Extreme Inequalities in Contemporary Capitalism; Should We Be Concerned About the Rich (2016)

-  Garrett - Too Big To Jail; How Prosecutors Compromise with Corporations (2014)

-  Golash-Boza - Immigrant Policing, Disposable Labor and Global Capitalism (2015)

-  Guttmann - Finance-Led Capitalism; Shadow Banking, Re-Regulation, and the Future of Global Markets (2016)

-  Hahnel & Wright - Alternatives to Capitalism; Proposals for a Democratic Economy (2014)

-  Hein et al (Eds.) - The Demise of Finance-Dominated Capitalism; Explaining the Financial and Economic Crises (2015)

-  Henry - From Communism to Capitalism; Theory of a Catastrophe (2014)

-  Hill - Raw Deal; How the 'Uber Economy' and Runaway Capitalism Are Screwing American Workers (2015)

-  Holloway - In, Against, and Beyond Capitalism; the San Francisco Lectures (2016)

-  Jeter - Flat Broke in the Free Market; How Globalization Fleeced Working People (2009)

-  Krier & Worrell (Eds.) - Capitalism's Future; Alienation, Emancipation and Critique (2016)

-  Lehmann - The Money Cult; Capitalism, Christianity, and the Unmaking of the American Dream (2016)

-  MacDonald - When Globalization Fails; the Rise and Fall of Pax Americana (2015)

-  Milanovic - Global Inequality; a New Approach for the Age of Globalization (2016)

-  Monbiot - How Did We Get into This Mess; Politics, Equality, Nature (2016)

-  Parijs - Real Freedom for All; What (if Anything) Can Justify Capitalism (1995)

-  Rothe & Friedrichs - Crimes of Globalization; New Directions in Critical Criminology (2015)

-  Slee - What's Yours Is Mine; Against the Sharing Economy (2015)

-  Sundararajan - The Sharing Economy; the End of Employment and the Rise of Crowd-Based Capitalism (2016)

-  Todd - The People; the Rise and Fall of the Working Class, 1910-2010 (2014)

-  Vaknin - Capitalistic Musings (2003)

-  Westra - Globalization, Violence and World Governance (2011)

-  Wilcock & Scholz - Hartmut Elsenhans and a Critique of Capitalism; Conversations on Theory and Policy Implication (2016)

-  Wolff - Capitalism's Crisis Deepens; Essays on the Global Economic Meltdown, 2010-2014 (2016)
